review_data.title: AMAZING!
review_data.content: I was born and raised in Southern California. My family is also Swiss, so I recently moved to Zürich. I was very underwhelmed with the Mexican food in Switzerland... until I found La Taquería! Let me tell you: this is the most authentic, delicious Mexican...More

review_data.title: Worst taste ever
review_data.content: Too many condiments and fat. The beans had so much oregano that they even tasted bitter. In Mexico the beans have not even oregano... It’s a shame it would be so easy to do it better, just a little of common sense. A totally distorted...More

review_data.title: Pricey drinks but great authentic food
review_data.content: The food and the friendly staff are the highlights of La Taqueria. The margaritas seem a bit overpriced, especially served on a lot of ice. Nonetheless this a good option for authentic Mexican food, best to order a variety of tacos and share.

review_data.title: Cal Mex in Zurich
